Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controller

Class MapSetter

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controller.MapSetter
public class MapSetter
extends java.lang.Object
Method for setting game after their starts sets player on start position, set enemies, set blocks by configuration map contains method and parameters for restarting plazers

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MapSetter()
    constructor, used map set from options
    MapSetter​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList> coordinates)
    constructor for load game

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList> deserialize​(java.lang.String strMain)
    method that deserialized game from String save data used for loading and server game
    Map getMap()  
    java.util.HashMap getMapParameters()
    method that return parameters about number of bonuses and enemies it is controlled by configuration file
    java.util.HashMap getObjectCoordinates()
    Method that set new Blocks into game coordinates and into game method used coordinates get from configuration map file call setMonsters, setPlayerOnStartPosition and setGateKeyBonuses
    java.util.ArrayList<int[]> getStartPositions()  
    java.util.ArrayList scanMap​(java.io.File file, java.util.ArrayList list)
    method that scan some file and get values from it
    void setGateAndKeyAndBonuses()
    method that set new bonuses, key and gate into game coordinates and into game bonuses van be in one block, it is for more interesting and random combinations
    void setChoosenMap()
    method that choose right map fille after option settings
    void setMapSize​(java.util.HashMap mapParams)
    method that find information about map size and set them to HashMap which is used for generating map
    void setMonsters()
    Method that set new monsters by their numbers into game map it set them their game coordinates it is possible to set monster on player corner start position
    void setPlayerOnStartPosition()
    method that set player on some corner position randomly
    Player setPlayerOnStartPosition​(Player player)
    method called from game after some player needs respawn
